## Demo Neural Network
This repository is an example of using neural network in machine learning

### Code Requirements
This repository is in Python 3. The other requirements are NumPy

### Description
The program is an machine learning demo using Neural Network

### Execution
To run this example, simply run the `test.py` file using Python 3
```
python3 test.py
```
The output will look like this
